gameplay.gameobject.powerups

Interface Powerup

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BombPassPowerup, BombPowerup, DetonatorPowerup, Door, FlamePassPowerup, FlamePowerup, SpeedPowerup, WallPassPowerup

    public interface Powerup
    Interface which defines the behavior of a powerup
    Author:
    mfong8

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void applyPowerup(BombermanInterface bomberman)
      applies the powerup's effect onto the given gameactor.
      void haveBeenBombed()
      Method that is called to inform the powerup that it's been bombed.

    • Method Detail

      • applyPowerup

        void applyPowerup(BombermanInterface bomberman)
        applies the powerup's effect onto the given gameactor.
        Parameters:
        bomberman - actor on which the powerup will be applied to.

        Method that is called to inform the powerup that it's been bombed.
